results.content: He mostly says and reads over each option in Gtmetrix and google page-speed. He only showed how to optimize pics which is basic in my opinion. He also says a lot of times "talk to your developer or give this information to the freelance that you hire. My expectation of him  was to demonstrate HOW to edit code and fix those issues that Gtmetrix shows. Also would be helpful to show how to setup catching plugins and CDN and CloudFlare.

He also says a lot of times "talk to your developer or give this information to the freelance that you hire. My expectation of him was to demonstrate HOW to edit code and fix those issues that Gtmetrix shows. Also would be helpful to show how to setup catching plugins and CDN and CloudFlare.

results.content: As someone who is not technically minded, I was able to follow and make use of Alex's tuition and found it clear and easy to understand.  If you need to speed up your loading times and make it easier to be higher ranked on Google, this course is for you.  Alex is an excellent teacher who can prove that what he teaches is what he does.  I would recommend any of Alex's courses to anyone.
